descriptionHtml:
Welcome!

[color=#00ff00][i]Merid Village[/i][/color] was supposed to be a small expansion for the main project, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49089/?]The New Vigil[/url].

After finishing the story "Fortress of the Damned", written by the character Adlanniel - more than a year ago, actually - I had been thinking about telling the story of the villagers. A cloud of many, many questions.

What happened to them?
Why did they leave the original village?
And what secrets do they keep as there are Vigilants of Stendarr still watching them? 


There are several npcs, two followers, some books and journals that may bring some light upon the facts described previously.
author: AfroSamurai2012
